EmailTemplate.name: CloseCaseSurveyResponseTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER CARE
{!Today()}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
IHS Markit Customer Care Team have completed your request and closed case {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you feel your request is not yet resolved and/or you have any further questions, please quote the above reference number when contacting us.
Your feedback is very important to us. Please share your experience with us by participating in our short survey. Your input will be used to help us understand what we can do differently and how we can improve upon our products and our service to you.
Complete the Survey
IHS Markit will process your personal information only for these purposes and will not be shared externally. All personal information will be protected and handled in line with our Privacy Policy which is available on our website.
Kind regards, IHS Markit Customer Care
{!Case.Thread_Id}
